verses.kjv: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.
verses.ct: May God show us kindness and bless us; may he look on us with favor. Selah.

verses.kjv: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.
verses.ct: So that your purposes may be recognized across the earth, and your salvation among every nation.

verses.kjv: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
verses.ct: Let the peoples praise you, God; let every one of them praise you.

verses.kjv: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.
verses.ct: Let the nations celebrate and shout with joy, because you rule over peoples with justice and guide the nations of the earth. Selah.

verses.kjv: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
verses.ct: Let the peoples praise you, God; let every one of them praise you.

verses.kjv: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.
verses.ct: Then the land will produce its harvest, and God — our own God — will bless us.

verses.kjv: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
verses.ct: God will bless us, and people from every corner of the earth will deeply revere him.
